statements: DELETE FROM project_metrics WHERE start_date = '2022-10-01' AND performance_metric > 0.8;
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_id = 100 AND project_name = 'Project A';
DELETE FROM kpis WHERE kpi_id = 50 AND project_id = 100;
DELETE FROM kpi_metrics WHERE kpi_name = 'Customer Satisfaction';
DELETE FROM project_team WHERE team_member_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM project_results WHERE project_id = 123 AND result_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 3 AND member_id = 5;
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE project_id = 1 AND role = 'Developer';
DELETE FROM project_tasks WHERE project_id = 2 AND deadline < '2022-01-01';
